name: Brandon Carrillo
introduction: I am a passionate and curious developer who embraces new challenges and thrives in dynamic environments.
longDescription: I have working knowledge of MySQL and SQL Server, and I am proficient in Git and GitHub. As a proactive and adaptable professional, I thrive in agile environments and enjoy tackling technical challenges to deliver innovative and scalable solutions. My goal is to continue learning and growing as a developer while contributing to impactful projects.
